column5: Another nice bunch of fish, love those Browns Richard
Incredible pictures msp  Reports like these have been getting me through the last few weeks
Great shots thanks for sharing love the pics with the big guy it looks like he is hooked for sure

Fall fishing this year has been great. Mostly targeting largies. Enjoy the pics.  Thanksgining weekend with the old man and the kid.....    Fall pike.... Twins    Noverber Largies......      Smoked my personal best largie with this 6 lb 6oz bucket......   Had my son out this weekend and we both did pretty good. He's catching them on his own now. He got his first pike today. Hours of entertainment in the live well for him. A crappie surprise !      Hopefully a couple more trips on the boat this year and I will keep you guys posted.
Nice report Nice to see you passing along the legacy to your son.That smile on his face says it all.
Awesome report and pics......real nice haul there. LOL....you should take a leaf outta your boy's book....TRY SMILING FOR A PIC TOO!

Awesome report and pics msp You certainly no slouch come fall season.... some real nice gators and buckets in them pics Congrats on that 6LBS 6oz largie    What a brute Thanks for sharing and keep up the great work Leechman
Nice!  Heard you guys are having a great fall.  I know you got more though..  C'mon man, spill it!!!  cheers HD
Nice Hogs, great pics.  Good to see you getting the young lad out.

Wow, terrific pics!!! Wish I could get my daughter hooked on fishin' as much as it looks like your boy loves it! I told her you wanna come fishing with Mommy, you better start loving fishing.  Thanx for sharing
the one largie is a football!  i love it
nice report;great fish - love the colours on them - especially those pike
Jealous!
Very nice report, couple of real fatties there.  Joey

As usual.....WELL DONE!  I think your son has caught more largies than me this year  One of those pike has a seriously beat-up crank hanging from its yap....never seen that colour combo before, but it appears to be effective  Great report....keep 'em coming
Thanks for the kind replies guys
I knew i'd regret that comment   Nice fish in that pic btw

Just an update from my favorite fishing month of the year. A couple of steelhead days provided double digit days. White knuckle driving in a snowstorm to my favorite pike lake last weekend got us some respectable fish for the last "up North" trip this season. There still may be a few trips before Christmas. I will keep you guys posted. enjoy the pics.
Those are some nice pike and some fat trout.
congrats on the big mouth's and gator's what was that crappie thinking
That's some sweet fishing right there.
nice man.  Makin me jealous!
Very nice! Great that you get to fish with your Dad AND Son!  Thanks for sharing.
Wow, awesome fish!!!   I'm so jealous
Very nice fish for the end of softwater season See a little snow on latest additions.  bbrrr... That crappie is a good size, must had been a surprise.
Looks like the boy had lots of fun with papa. Those fish are Bee-you-tiful! Great fall!  That one pike must have eaten something sharp...you can see it sticking out of his stomach.  Cheers

Good work Mike....looks like your fall patterns are holding up well again.  Hope your back is healing up.  I thought that pic with you "smiling" was actually quite flattering......given the real thing
